description: Arlong's fortress headquarters on Cocoyasi Village, featuring a large pool for fish-men and intimidating architecture.

keyEvents.title: Nami Refuses Arlong's Ultimatum
keyEvents.description: Nami makes her stand against Arlong at his own fortress.

keyEvents.title: Sanji Dives to Rescue Luffy
keyEvents.description: Sanji dives into the pool at Arlong Park to free Luffy.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Battles Arlong
keyEvents.description: Major battle between Zoro and Arlong takes place at Arlong Park.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Confronts Arlong
keyEvents.description: The confrontation between Luffy and Arlong begins at Arlong Park.

culturalSignificance: Symbol of Arlong's oppression over Cocoyasi Village and surrounding areas. The fortress represents fish-man supremacy and tyranny.
